Description: Fragment of oval handle of a Rhodian pottery transport amphora. Clay near fine light buff-brown. Rectangular stamp. Greek inscription.
Curator's comments: Petrie diary Petrie noted several such stamps in his 1884-5 diary (EES Archive XVII 47). Name Aristion
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (JB.0696)
